ing: 2 pounds kielbasa sausage, cut into 1 inch pieces
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer
des: "A delicious, minimal prep recipe to serve as a side dish with dinner, or for company! My husband would live on this if I let him, and our entire family loves it!  A slow cooker recipe too easy not to try!"
ins: In a slow cooker combine sausage, beer and sauerkraut.  Cook on low for 5 to 6 hours, until the meat is tender and plump.
